item.title: Всем заправляет бизнес
item.description: In the context of the development of corporate software applications, the architect should become a kind of bridge in the company between the business and technical communities, representing and defending the interests of both sides and often acting as a mediator between them, but at the same time allowing the business to control the affairs.When making technological decisions, the architect must be guided by the business objectives of the company and its surrounding realities. Before undertaking a software development project, a commercial company usually plans and announces the desired return on investment (ROI).The architect must accept this indicator and the resulting limitations of the value of the product created for the company.This will help to avoid technical solutions that could lead to excessive expenditure.
